snippet: Guinea’s opposition coalition demanded the annulment of last month’s legislative elections, citing what it said were widespread irregularities in the voting.
abstract: Guinea’s opposition coalition demanded the annulment of September’s legislative elections, citing what it says are widespread irregularities in voting and threatening to call for protests.
lead_paragraph: Guinea’s opposition coalition demanded the annulment of last month’s legislative elections, citing what it said were widespread irregularities in the voting.

headline.main: Guinea: Opposition Seeks to Invalidate Vote
headline.print_headline: Guinea: Opposition Seeks to Invalidate Vote
